title: mining.farm.quebec
author: mining.farm.quebec
content: Hi miners,I am a GPU's miner from Quebec, Canada. I have difficult times like all.I am looking for a partner looking for electricity and a infrastructure-ready for GPUs or ASIC. I have place for you!*This is what I have to offer*- Hydro-Quebec Electricity Blockchain Contract (legal electricity near 0.05 USD per kwh)- Available power: 1 megawatts- Electric input and transformer: Yes- Electric sockets: more than 500 plugs available (20A / 208V)*To be included in our partnership*- Infrastructure- Access to my electricity contract- 5 years or more, I want long term partner- Secure my mining farmPlease, DM me for more info.THANK YOU!
